segments.text: I haven't danced for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We must go to a dance soon , or we'll forget how to dance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we must . What have you been doing since I last saw you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been studying hard for my examinations . And you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been learning Japanese every evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why have you been learning Japanese ? Why not English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope to visit Japan next year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we'll both have to start learning all the new dances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , let's go into the dance-hall and ask if we can take dancing-lessons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A good idea . They can teach elephants to dance nowadays perhaps there's hope for us !
segments.speaker: S1
